<rule id="springboot-properties-to-quarkus-00003" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="application{profile}.{extension}" pattern="logging.level.org.springframework"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace Spring log level property with Quarkus property">
                    <message>
                        Spring log level property configuration have been detected in the application property file.

                        View advice in the Quarkus datasource guide to convert these to Quarkus log level properties.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/logging#runtime-configuration" title="Quarkus Configuring Logging Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
